languages.text: "Не могу их винить: навигаторы — мутанты, пусть и благородных кровей".

traits.locale_text: "Прости, но я не переношу мутантов — даже если они благородных кровей".

languages.text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."
languages.original_text: "Не могу их винить: навигаторы — мутанты, пусть и благородных кровей".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot blame them. The navigators are mutants, even if highborn."
"I cannot blame them. The navigators are mutants, even if highborn."
"I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."
"I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."
"I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

languages.text: “我不能责怪那些人。尽管导航者出身高贵，但也一样是变种人。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: “我不能责怪那些人。尽管导航者出身高贵，但也一样是变种人。”

languages.text: «No puedo culparles. Los Navegantes son mutantes, por mucho que sean mutantes nobles».
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo culparles. Los Navegantes son mutantes, por mucho que sean mutantes nobles».

languages.text: 「彼らを責めることはできない。航宙士は変異体だ。ハイボーンではあるがな」
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らを責めることはできない。航宙士は変異体だ。ハイボーンではあるがな」

languages.text: "Ich kann es ihnen nicht verübeln. Navigatoren sind Mutanten, wenn auch hochgeborene Mutanten."
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es ihnen nicht verübeln. Navigatoren sind Mutanten, wenn auch hochgeborene Mutanten."

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas leur en vouloir. Les navigateurs sont des mutants. De noble naissance, certes, mais des mutants quand même. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas leur en vouloir. Les navigateurs sont des mutants. De noble naissance, certes, mais des mutants quand même. »

languages.text: "Onları suçlayamam. Rotacılar, soylu olabilirler ama neticede onlar da mutant."
languages.original_text: "I cannot blame them. Navigators are mutants, albeit highborn mutants."

traits.locale_text: "Onları suçlayamam. Rotacılar soylu da olsa mutant mutanttır."
